book.synopsis: A sleepy town on the coast of Japan is under quiet, deadly siege, not by a person or group but by a primeval spiral shape whose victims include both parents of Shuichi Saito. In this second volume of the saga, Shuichi\x92s girlfriend Kirie becomes further involved in the town\x92s terrible secret when schoolmates start turning up as horrible human snails and something unspeakable is discovered within the walls of the local hospital.
book.dimensions: Height: 8 Inches, Length: 5 Inches, Weight: 0.65 Pounds, Width: 0.5 Inches
